ongoing.text:
Several activities within INAF-IAPS:
  • project "Circuito Cinema"
  • project "Spazio Aperto", a science outreach program in Rebibbia prison
  • seminars in schools
  • content organization of the INAF exhibition "Macchine del Tempo" in Rome (November)
  • In the Gruppo Storie (member since 2020) of INAF I am involved in several activities that will continue in the future: podcast Martina Tremenda and a science column for children Briciole Spaziali (<14 years)
  • development of a second comics project (Frammenti di cielo^2)
  • development of the comic Frammenti di Cielo
  • articles and festival participation
  • I am a member of Univers@ll, the INAF team dedicated to inclusion and diversity
  • I am co-responsible with Dr. Anna Wolter (IASF Milan) for outreach in the ASTRI MA project

Collaboration with the Rione Roma association for tour guide events in Rome dedicated to astronomy. A concrete outcome of the project is the Museo degli Alberi, a free app that lets you take a walk around Rome through botany, art, society, and astronomy
Collaboration with the Daphne project: cultural and interdisciplinary events bringing together literature, music, visual arts, philosophy, and science.
Collaboration with Astronomitaly for outreach activities and observing sessions.
Collaboration with the online magazine Verbum Press with my column "Bolle Spaziali".
I host my own column "A Spazio con Marty" on the radio program "Avanti Tutta" on Radio Kaos Italy, where I talk about astrophysics.
YouTube channel dedicated to science and space outreach. My videos are used on the Edu-INAF page.
Astrophysics outreach in Roman dialect on Facebook.
